data.name: Trainz 2022 DLC - Canadian Rocky Mountains Viktor Lake to Ross Peak and Glacier
data.detailed_description:
TRS19 exclusive Canadian rocky Mountains CPR route segment:

This all new TRS19 CPR route covers the Canadian Rocky Mountains from Viktor Lake east of Revelstoke all the way to the famous CPR tunnels Mc Donald and Connaught.

Enjoy the scenery and master this challenging section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains, whilst obeying signals and speedlimits.

Switching lovers can head over to the Revelstoke area where there is lots of excitement in shunting and rearranging, creating long haul consists east and west bound.
data.about_the_game:
TRS19 exclusive Canadian rocky Mountains CPR route segment:

This all new TRS19 CPR route covers the Canadian Rocky Mountains from Viktor Lake east of Revelstoke all the way to the famous CPR tunnels Mc Donald and Connaught.

Enjoy the scenery and master this challenging section of the Canadian Rocky Mountains, whilst obeying signals and speedlimits.

Switching lovers can head over to the Revelstoke area where there is lots of excitement in shunting and rearranging, creating long haul consists east and west bound.
data.short_description: Drive through the Canadian Rocky Mountains between Viktor Lake, through the famous CPR McDonald and Connaught tunnels, to Ross Peak and Glacier.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
